claims.text: The 2020 US presidential election was conducted fairly and securely
claims.fact_checker_reasoning: Multiple audits, recounts, and court cases found no evidence of widespread fraud in the 2020 election. Election security experts confirm the election was conducted with appropriate safeguards.

claims.text: The unemployment rate has decreased significantly in the past year
claims.fact_checker_reasoning: Bureau of Labor Statistics data confirms unemployment rates have decreased from previous years.

claims.text: Tax cuts in the current administration will pay for themselves
claims.fact_checker_reasoning: Economic analysis shows tax cuts typically increase deficits in the short and medium term rather than paying for themselves through growth.
